text: @EricTrump And your father is a LOSER!!!. Oklahoma rally...FAILED, DACA decision....OPPOSED, Blockage of John Bolton' s book....FAILED. Respect from America and the world..... Non-existent!!!, Coronavirus response..... INSUFFICIENT!!, Response to BLM and protesters...... RACIST!!!
